to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: finding programs using debian?
body:
>>>>> "LT" == Littlefield, Tyler  writes:

    LT> Hello list, Is there a way to find out which package a program
    LT> belongs to with apt?
dpkg -S PROGRAM

better with full path.
